stories.title: Ether, antiradio, listen to the electromagnetic landscape around you
Artificial intelligence that understands object relationships

stories.text:
Hi HN!

We're Evan and Yinshi from Akia (https://akia.com). We've built a customer engagement platform that specializes in the building and distribution of Mini Apps-- apps (if you will) that don't require download or login.

You can send one yourself (this is a relatively naive example): https://sys.akia.com/demo/textme

We're looking to solve a problem local service businesses face around the fact that consumers are not very likely to discover and download a native app.

We initially built Akia to solve workflows using text-messaging and NLP, but quickly discovered that the last mile on NLP is very hard and consumers are happier using a mobile-optimized interface. We did a small pivot and have found a lot of success mitigating the challenges that businesses were initially looking at solving with native solutions.

By developing app-like experiences in the browser to be sent over text, Akia is building and distribution in one package.

We're running up against our $1M milestone and are now expanding into other verticals. Would love thoughts and feedback, especially on use-cases that you think we've missed, or might be particularly interesting for this tech.
